name: @groww-tech/eslint-plugin-internal
description: ESLint Plugin with customized rules as per requirement and preferences of devs in Groww.
author: Vikas Singh <vikas.singh707@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/VikasSi25579022)

scripts.pushTags: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag -a eslint-plugin-internal-v$PACKAGE_VERSION -m "@groww-tech/eslint-plugin-internal-v$PACKAGE_VERSION" && git push --tags
